DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study is using a novel technology to measure the rate of turnover of new fat cells. Analysis of volunteer samples is ongoing, however the study is currently not enrolling new volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Aged 1849 years. Healthy. Significant chronic medical illness. Illicit substance or alcohol abuse. Body mass index > 27 kg/meters squared. Underweight (BMI < 20 kg/m2). History of keloid formation (excessive scarring). Pregnant.
